name: Alone in the blue
description:
Alone in the blue is a short jump & run game that was created for the Wowie Jam 3.0.

You are alone in the blue in a place you don't know and all you want is to find some friends.
On your way to find friends you will fail several times but fail just leads to progress.

Controlls:
Move with A/D or Up/Down arrows.
Jump with Space or Up arrow.
